title: Confirmation modals not centered on screen
root_cause: Modal.tsx backdrop uses `items-end` which anchors the modal to the bottom of the screen like a bottom sheet. Should use `items-center` to vertically center it.
fix_applied: Changed `items-end` to `items-center` on the backdrop div in Modal.tsx. Removed the redundant `pb-4` default padding (keyboard-aware padding is already handled via the paddingBottom style).
completion_summary: One-line change in Modal.tsx. Build passed clean.
